Posts.HTML:
Im using he online version.
is there any possible version to put like a "password" to a computer?

Posts.EditableText: do you mean within your game (aka during game play), there's a 'computer' Object that requires you to provide a 'password' for it, or do you mean outside of your game, to prevent people from playing your game (accessing your game file) ??? ------------- in-game: http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/ http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/guides/ http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/ ... kdoor.html http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/ ... tiple.html http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/ ... _case.html http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/ ... witch.html http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/scripts/if.html hope this helps!
Posts.HTML:
do you mean within your game (aka during game play), there's a 'computer' Object that requires you to provide a 'password' for it, or do you mean outside of your game, to prevent people from playing your game (accessing your game file) ???
